description: Argentina's National Institute of Industrial Technology (INTI) focuses on supporting local food industry development through sustainable practices. INTI collaborates with various stakeholders, including small producers and large industries, to enhance food processing and product development. Their initiatives emphasize local resource utilization, nutritional value, and circular economy principles. They advocate for partnerships and social impact projects, aiming to foster sustainability in food systems, and also highlight the importance of training and knowledge sharing to empower local enterprises.
name: National Institute of Industrial Technology (INTI)
